pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: describe legacy behavior

content.raw: I think the tutorial describes well the current behaviour. It could also be nice to discuss what happens when a `<joint>` is a direct child of the `<world>`, which is [supported](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/src/21d2cbe52bbd104f24a50b0037e5b3da5657c644/sdf/1.6/world.sdf?fileviewer=file-view-default#world.sdf-58) by the spec.
content.html: I think the tutorial describes well the current behaviour. It could also be nice to discuss what happens when a <joint> is a direct child of the <world>, which is supported by the spec.
